text: Wakan Q'allay (Quechua, waka cow, -n a suffix, q'allay to cut into small pieces, Hispanicized spelling Huajancallay) is a mountain in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is situated in the Huancavelica Region, Huaytará Province, Pilpichaca District. Wakan Q'allay lies east of Qispi Q'awa.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Huamanga Province (Ayacucho Region) ==References== Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Huancavelica Region
title: Wakan Q'allay
